summary: Completed comprehensive frontend testing of EKA-AI Claude.ai-style interface. All core features working correctly: Login page with email/password auth, AppShell layout with collapsible sidebar, Dashboard with KPI cards/charts/tables, Chat page with welcome screen/suggestion chips/model selector, Job Cards page with stats/filters/table, and sidebar navigation.

issues: Console warning: 'The width(-1) and height(-1) of chart should be greater than 0' - Recharts dimension issue on initial render, charts display correctly after layout settles

passed_tests: Login Page: EKA-AI branding with mascot logo visible
Login Page: Continue with Google button functional
Login Page: Email input accepts input
Login Page: Continue with email expands password field
Login Page: Sign in with valid credentials redirects to /app/dashboard
Login Page: Feature video carousel on right side
Login Page: Mobile responsive with hamburger menu
Login Page: Mobile feature showcase grid visible
AppShell: Sidebar visible after login (data-testid='sidebar')
AppShell: Sidebar toggle collapses from 256px to 64px
AppShell: New Chat button functional (data-testid='new-chat-btn')
AppShell: Navigation items: Dashboard, Job Cards, PDI Checklist, Fleet Mgmt, Invoices
AppShell: Pro Plan upgrade CTA visible
AppShell: User profile display shows name and email
AppShell: Settings button in sidebar
TopBar: Page title displays correctly (data-testid='page-title')
TopBar: Notifications button present (data-testid='notifications-btn')
TopBar: User menu button opens dropdown (data-testid='user-menu-btn')
TopBar: User dropdown shows Settings and Sign out options
TopBar: Model selector visible on chat page (data-testid='mode-selector')
TopBar: Model options: Gemini Flash, Gemini Pro, RAG + Agent
Dashboard: KPI cards (Open Job Cards, Completed Today, Revenue, AI Queries)
Dashboard: Revenue Trend area chart
Dashboard: Job Status donut chart with legend
Dashboard: Recent Job Cards table with status badges
Dashboard: AI Activity feed
Dashboard: Start AI Chat button
Chat Page: Welcome screen with EKA logo
Chat Page: 'How can I help with the garage today?' title
Chat Page: 4 suggestion chips (Diagnose, Job card, Invoice, Fleet)
Chat Page: Messages area (data-testid='messages-area')
Chat Page: Chat input (data-testid='chat-input')
Chat Page: Send message button (data-testid='send-message-btn')
Chat Page: Attach file button (data-testid='attach-file-btn')
Chat Page: Voice input button (data-testid='voice-input-btn')
Chat Page: Recent chat sessions in sidebar
Job Cards: Page title and description
Job Cards: Stats cards (Total Jobs, Active Jobs, Awaiting Approval, In PDI)
Job Cards: New Job Card button
Job Cards: Search bar with status/priority filters
Job Cards: Job cards table with vehicle, status, priority, actions columns
Sidebar Navigation: All nav items clickable and redirect correctly
critical_code_review_comments: Recharts console warnings can be suppressed by ensuring container has explicit dimensions before chart renders
Good: All interactive elements have data-testid attributes for testing
Good: Sidebar collapse/expand animation is smooth (300ms transition)
Good: Model selector dropdown uses group-hover for clean interaction
Good: Chat page suggestion chips are well-designed with icons
seed_data_creation: No seed data created - used existing test user
context_for_next_testing_agent: EKA-AI frontend with Claude.ai-style interface is fully functional. Login at '/', dashboard at '/app/dashboard', chat at '/chat'. All navigation uses react-router-dom. Sidebar is collapsible. Model selector only shows on chat page. Test user: testuser@test.com / test123456
